an6.42:4.1: * Evaṃ me sutaṃ—​
an6.42:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṃghena saddhiṃ yena icchānaṅgalaṃ nāma kosalānaṃ brāhmaṇagāmo tadavasari.
an6.42:4.3: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā icchānaṅgale viharati icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe.
an6.42:4.5: “samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito icchānaṅgalaṃ anuppatto icchānaṅgale viharati icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍe.
an6.42:4.6: Taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
an6.42:4.7: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno … pe …
an6.42:4.11: Atha kho icchānaṅgalakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā tassā rattiyā accayena pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ādāya yena icchānaṅgalavanasaṇḍo tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
an6.42:5.1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nāgito bhagavato upaṭṭhāko hoti.
an6.42:5.2: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ nāgitaṃ āmantesi:
an6.42:5.3: “ke pana te, nāgita, uccāsaddā mahāsaddā kevaṭṭā maññe macchavilope”ti?
an6.42:5.4: “Ete, bhante, icchānaṅgalakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā pahūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ ādāya bahidvārakoṭṭhake ṭhitā bhagavantaṃyeva uddissa bhikkhusaṅghañcā”ti.
an6.42:5.5: “Māhaṃ, nāgita, yasena samāgamaṃ, mā ca mayā yaso.
an6.42:5.6: Yo kho, nāgita, nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī assa akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, yassāhaṃ nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, so taṃ mīḷhasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ lābhasakkārasilokasukhaṃ sādiyeyyā”ti.
an6.42:6.4: Yena yeneva dāni, bhante, bhagavā gamissati, tanninnāva bhavissanti brāhmaṇagahapatikā negamā ceva jānapadā ca.
an6.42:6.5: Seyyathāpi, bhante, thullaphusitake deve vassante yathāninnaṃ udakāni pavattanti;
an6.42:6.6: evamevaṃ kho, bhante, yena yeneva dāni bhagavā gamissati, tanninnāva bhavissanti brāhmaṇagahapatikā negamā ceva jānapadā ca.
an6.42:7.1: “Māhaṃ, nāgita, yasena samāgamaṃ, mā ca mayā yaso.
an6.42:7.2: Yo kho, nāgita, nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī assa akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, yassāhaṃ nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, so taṃ mīḷhasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ lābhasakkārasilokasukhaṃ sādiyeyya.
an6.42:8.1: Idhāhaṃ, nāgita, bhikkhuṃ passāmi gāmantavihāriṃ samāhitaṃ nisinnaṃ.
an6.42:8.3: ‘idānimaṃ āyasmantaṃ ārāmiko vā upaṭṭhahissati samaṇuddeso vā taṃ tamhā samādhimhā cāvessatī’ti.
an6.42:8.4: Tenāhaṃ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno na attamano homi gāmantavihārena. (1)
an6.42:9.1: Idha panāhaṃ, nāgita, bhikkhuṃ passāmi āraññikaṃ araññe pacalāyamānaṃ nisinnaṃ.
an6.42:9.3: ‘idāni ayamāyasmā imaṃ niddākilamathaṃ paṭivinodetvā araññasaññaṃyeva manasi karissati ekattan’ti.
an6.42:9.4: Tenāhaṃ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi araññavihārena. (2)
an6.42:10.1: Idha panāhaṃ, nāgita, bhikkhuṃ passāmi āraññikaṃ araññe asamāhitaṃ nisinnaṃ.
an6.42:10.3: ‘idāni ayamāyasmā asamāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ samādahissati, samāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ anurakkhissatī’ti.
an6.42:10.4: Tenāhaṃ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi araññavihārena. (3)
an6.42:11.1: Idha panāhaṃ, nāgita, bhikkhuṃ passāmi āraññikaṃ araññe samāhitaṃ nisinnaṃ.
an6.42:11.3: ‘idāni ayamāyasmā avimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ vimocessati, vimuttaṃ vā cittaṃ anurakkhissatī’ti.
an6.42:11.4: Tenāhaṃ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi araññavihārena. (4)
an6.42:12.1: Idha panāhaṃ, nāgita, bhikkhuṃ passāmi gāmantavihāriṃ lābhiṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ.
an6.42:12.2: So taṃ lābhasakkārasilokaṃ nikāmayamāno riñcati paṭisallānaṃ riñcati araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni;
an6.42:12.4: Tenāhaṃ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno na attamano homi gāmantavihārena. (5)
an6.42:13.1: Idha panāhaṃ, nāgita, bhikkhuṃ passāmi āraññikaṃ lābhiṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārānaṃ.
an6.42:13.2: So taṃ lābhasakkārasilokaṃ paṭipaṇāmetvā na riñcati paṭisallānaṃ na riñcati araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni.
an6.42:13.3: Tenāhaṃ, nāgita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi araññavihārena. (6)
an6.42:14.1: Yasmāhaṃ, nāgita, samaye addhānamaggappaṭipanno na kañci passāmi purato vā pacchato vā, phāsu me, nāgita, tasmiṃ samaye hoti antamaso uccārapassāvakammāyā”ti.
